to.personal: Blogger Help Group - Share Your Blog

headers.to: Blogger Help Group - Share Your Blog <[email address]>
headers.subject: Re: Culture Shock
headers.x-http-useragent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 5.1; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; IEMB3),gzip(gfe),gzip(gfe)

body.para: Based on the comments that you made, you may find my blog interesting. I try to analyze things in a somewhat different fashion. I shall soon write about the myopic attitude of most Americans who have not visited other countries. I'm a motivational speaker, and I’m about to embark on a nationwide tour of college campuses to talk to students about choices, decisions, consequences, and personal responsibility. We will utilize adults, who have encountered, and recovered from, various difficulties in life, as teaching vehicles, in conjunction with the latest research on the brain and decision theory. I should have a new post within the next 24 hours. Visit My New Blog: http://theviewfromoutsidemytinywindow.blogspot.com/

quote.quotepara: Whenever we visited other country we encounter culture shock.. to know more....
